languages.text: "Группа работяг в дальнем углу теперь каждую пересменку собирается, шепчется. Меня не зовут — говорят, много болтаю. Раз боятся моего языка, значит, есть что скрывать".

traits.locale_text: "Группа работяг в дальнем углу теперь каждую пересменку собирается в кружок по интересом. Меня туда не зовут — говорят, много болтаю. Раз боятся моего языка, значит, есть что скрывать".

languages.text: "There is a bunch of workers in the far corner who now gather between every shift, whispering to each other. They don't invite me — they say I talk too much. Well, if they're scared of my tongue, that means they have something to hide."
languages.original_text: "Группа работяг в дальнем углу теперь каждую пересменку собирается, шепчется. Меня не зовут — говорят, много болтаю. Раз боятся моего языка, значит, есть что скрывать".

traits.locale_text: "A bunch of workers in the far corner now gather every shift, whispering to each other. They do not invite me, they say I talk too much. If they are afraid of my tongue, it means they have something to hide."

"A bunch of workers in the far corner now gather every shift, whispering to each other. They do not invite me, they say I talk too much. If they are afraid of my tongue, it means they have something to hide."

"There is a bunch of workers in the far corner who now gather between every shift, whispering to each other. They don't invite me — they say I talk too much. Well, if they're scared of my tongue, that means they have something to hide."

languages.text: "Hinten in der Ecke ist ein ganzer Haufen Arbeiter, die sich jetzt immer zwischen den Schichten versammeln und untereinander wispern. Sie laden mich nie dazu ein. Sie sagen, ich rede zu viel. Tja, wenn sie Angst vor meiner Zunge haben, dann heißt das, dass sie etwas zu verbergen haben."
languages.original_text: "There is a bunch of workers in the far corner who now gather between every shift, whispering to each other. They don't invite me — they say I talk too much. Well, if they're scared of my tongue, that means they have something to hide."

traits.locale_text: "Hinten in der Ecke ist ein ganzer Haufen Arbeiter, die sich jetzt immer zwischen den Schichten versammeln und untereinander wispern. Sie laden mich nie dazu ein. Sie sagen, ich rede zu viel. Tja, wenn sie Angst vor meiner Zunge haben, dann heißt das, dass sie etwas zu verbergen haben."

languages.text: «Hay un grupo de trabajadores en la esquina más alejada que se reúnen entre turnos para susurrarse. A mí no me invitan porque dicen que hablo mucho. Pero si le tienen miedo a mi lengua, será que tienen algo que ocultar».
languages.original_text: "There is a bunch of workers in the far corner who now gather between every shift, whispering to each other. They don't invite me — they say I talk too much. Well, if they're scared of my tongue, that means they have something to hide."

traits.locale_text: «Hay un grupo de trabajadores en la esquina más alejada que se reúnen entre turnos para susurrarse. A mí no me invitan porque dicen que hablo mucho. Pero si le tienen miedo a mi lengua, será que tienen algo que ocultar».

languages.text: 「あっちの隅に、シフトの合間に集まってひそひそ話している作業員がいる。あいつらは俺は誘わないんだ…俺がしゃべりすぎるって言って。まあ、俺のしゃべりが怖いってことは、何か隠し事があるってことなんだな」
languages.original_text: "There is a bunch of workers in the far corner who now gather between every shift, whispering to each other. They don't invite me — they say I talk too much. Well, if they're scared of my tongue, that means they have something to hide."

traits.locale_text: 「あっちの隅に、シフトの合間に集まってひそひそ話している作業員がいる。あいつらは俺は誘わないんだ…俺がしゃべりすぎるって言って。まあ、俺のしゃべりが怖いってことは、何か隠し事があるってことなんだな」

languages.text: “每次换班的时候，都会有一群工人聚在一起，窃窃私语。他们不允许我参加，因为他们说我嘴巴太松了。要我说，既然他们担心我嘴巴松，那他们肯定是打算隐瞒什么事情。”
languages.original_text: "There is a bunch of workers in the far corner who now gather between every shift, whispering to each other. They don't invite me — they say I talk too much. Well, if they're scared of my tongue, that means they have something to hide."

traits.locale_text: “每次换班的时候，都会有一群工人聚在一起，窃窃私语。他们不允许我参加，因为他们说我嘴巴太松了。要我说，既然他们担心我嘴巴松，那他们肯定是打算隐瞒什么事情。”

languages.text: « Plusieurs ouvriers se rassemblent entre chaque quart pour murmurer des trucs entre eux. Moi, je suis pas invité. Paraît que j'ai la langue trop bien pendue. S'ils ont si peur que je parle, c'est parce qu'ils ont quelque chose à cacher. »
languages.original_text: "There is a bunch of workers in the far corner who now gather between every shift, whispering to each other. They don't invite me — they say I talk too much. Well, if they're scared of my tongue, that means they have something to hide."

traits.locale_text: « Plusieurs ouvriers se rassemblent entre chaque quart pour murmurer des trucs entre eux. Moi, je suis pas invité. Paraît que j'ai la langue trop bien pendue. S'ils ont si peur que je parle, c'est parce qu'ils ont quelque chose à cacher. »

languages.text: "Her vardiya arasında uzak bir köşede toplanıp birbirlerine fısıldayan birkaç işçi var. Beni aralarına çağırmıyorlar. Çok konuştuğumu söylüyorlar. Konuşmam onları bu kadar korkutuyorsa demek ki sakladıkları bir şey var."
languages.original_text: "There is a bunch of workers in the far corner who now gather between every shift, whispering to each other. They don't invite me — they say I talk too much. Well, if they're scared of my tongue, that means they have something to hide."
